strapiEvent.name: Benton County Sheriff's Cup Golf Tournament
strapiEvent.description:
The Benton County Sheriff's Cup Golf Tournament is back for the 3rd year, organized by L.E.A.P. NWA, which provides protective equipment for local law enforcement and offers financial & medical assistance for officers and their families during times of need.


The Charity Golf Event at Pinnacle Country Club on Monday, Jun 12, will be a 4-man scramble format with 8a and 1p flight times, lunch provided by Whole Hog Cafe, and prizes will be awarded for 1st and 2nd place in each flight, hole-in-ones, closest to pins, longest drives, and more.


Purchase sponsorship packages HERE and register for the Golf Tournament HERE.
